Entity/Subject: Russia launches sustained drone and missile barrages against Ukrainian cities; Wagner Group mutiny shakes Kremlin authority
Key Player/Organization: Vladimir Putin, Volodymyr Zelensky, Yevgeny Prigozhin, NATO
Expected Impact/Value: Over 10,000 Ukrainian civilian casualties in 2023; Wagner mutiny exposed fractures in Russian military command; Western aid pledges exceeded $150bn

Entity/Subject: Hamas launches surprise attack on Israel on Oct 7; Israel declares war and launches ground invasion of Gaza
Key Player/Organization: Hamas, IDF, Benjamin Netanyahu, UN Security Council
Expected Impact/Value: 1,200 Israelis killed on Oct 7; over 20,000 Palestinians killed by year-end; massive humanitarian crisis in Gaza; global protests

Entity/Subject: Military coup ousts President Bazoum; ECOWAS threatens intervention; France expelled from Niger as anti-Western sentiment surges
Key Player/Organization: General Abdourahamane Tchiani, ECOWAS, France, Wagner Group
Expected Impact/Value: Wave of coups across Sahel (Mali, Burkina Faso, Niger); France withdraws 1,500 troops; Russian influence expands in West Africa

Entity/Subject: War erupts between Sudanese Armed Forces and Rapid Support Forces (RSF) in April 2023, triggering mass displacement
Key Player/Organization: General al-Burhan (SAF), General Dagalo 'Hemedti' (RSF), African Union
Expected Impact/Value: Over 9 million displaced — largest displacement crisis globally; 15,000+ killed; Khartoum largely destroyed

Entity/Subject: China conducts largest-ever military exercises encircling Taiwan following Speaker McCarthy–Tsai meeting
Key Player/Organization: Xi Jinping, Tsai Ing-wen, Kevin McCarthy, PLA
Expected Impact/Value: PLA fires missiles over Taiwan; US deploys additional carrier groups; Taiwan Strait remains flashpoint for great power conflict

Entity/Subject: 7.8-magnitude earthquake kills over 50,000 in Turkey and Syria; largest disaster in region in decades
Key Player/Organization: Erdogan, Assad, UN OCHA, WHO
Expected Impact/Value: 53,000+ killed; $100bn+ in damages; displaced 3 million; exposed Syrian conflict humanitarian crisis; influenced Turkish elections

Entity/Subject: EU AI Act debated; US Executive Order on AI safety; China implements own AI regulations; ChatGPT reaches 100m users
Key Player/Organization: OpenAI, European Commission, Biden Administration, China's MIIT
Expected Impact/Value: First major AI governance frameworks; global race to regulate; $100bn+ in AI investment; reshaping education, jobs, and security

Entity/Subject: Central banks worldwide raise rates to highest in decades to combat post-pandemic inflation; cost-of-living crisis deepens
Key Player/Organization: Federal Reserve (Powell), ECB (Lagarde), Bank of England, IMF
Expected Impact/Value: Fed rate hits 5.25–5.5%; mortgage rates double in US/UK; emerging market debt distress; global growth slows to 3%

Topic/Sector: US Banking Crisis – SVB & Credit Suisse
Entity/Subject: Silicon Valley Bank collapses in largest US bank failure since 2008; Credit Suisse emergency takeover by UBS
Key Player/Organization: FDIC, Swiss National Bank, UBS, US Treasury
Expected Impact/Value: $200bn+ wiped from global banking shares; $17bn Credit Suisse AT1 bonds written to zero; contagion fears trigger global market selloff

Topic/Sector: India Becomes World's Most Populous Nation
Entity/Subject: India surpasses China as world's most populous nation with 1.428 billion people; geopolitical and economic implications
Key Player/Organization: UN, Modi Government, China's National Bureau of Statistics
Expected Impact/Value: Demographic dividend vs. infrastructure pressure; India's growing global influence at G20 Presidency; China's population declines

Topic/Sector: India G20 Presidency & New Delhi Declaration
Entity/Subject: India hosts G20 summit; landmark declaration achieved despite Russia-Ukraine disagreement; African Union joins G20
Key Player/Organization: Modi, Biden, Xi, African Union, G20
Expected Impact/Value: Global South elevated; African Union gains permanent G20 seat; $100bn climate finance pledges; India asserts new geopolitical status

Entity/Subject: Prigozhin leads Wagner mercenary force toward Moscow in unprecedented challenge to Putin; mutiny called off after 24 hours
Key Player/Organization: Yevgeny Prigozhin, Vladimir Putin, Alexander Lukashenko
Expected Impact/Value: Most serious challenge to Putin's authority in 23 years; Prigozhin killed in plane crash 2 months later; reveals cracks in Russian military

Entity/Subject: China brokers historic Iran–Saudi Arabia normalization deal after years of proxy conflicts and severed relations
Key Player/Organization: Xi Jinping, Mohammed bin Salman, Ebrahim Raisi, China
Expected Impact/Value: Reshapes Middle East geopolitics; reduces US influence as broker; opens possibility of Yemen peace; oil market implications

Entity/Subject: Ethnic armed organizations and People's Defence Force make major territorial gains against junta; Operation 1027 reshapes conflict
Key Player/Organization: Min Aung Hlaing (junta), ARSA, National Unity Government, Brotherhood Alliance
Expected Impact/Value: Junta loses key northern territories; 2 million internally displaced; ASEAN paralyzed; China pressures junta for ceasefire

Topic/Sector: UN SDG Midpoint Report — Climate Targets Failing
Entity/Subject: UN SDG Summit finds only 15% of goals on track; 2030 Agenda at risk; climate, poverty, and inequality targets severely lagging
Key Player/Organization: António Guterres, UNDP, World Bank
Expected Impact/Value: World off-track for 1.5°C; 700 million still in extreme poverty; calls for $500bn annual developing country support

Entity/Subject: COP28 in Dubai calls for 'transition away' from fossil fuels; first global stocktake; loss and damage fund operationalized
Key Player/Organization: Sultan Al Jaber (COP28 President), Guterres, OPEC nations
Expected Impact/Value: Historic language on fossil fuel phase-down; $700m pledged to loss & damage fund; 130 countries sign tripling renewables pledge

Entity/Subject: BRICS expands to include Saudi Arabia, UAE, Iran, Ethiopia, Egypt, Argentina — largest expansion since founding
Key Player/Organization: Xi Jinping, Putin, Modi, Ramaphosa, Lula
Expected Impact/Value: BRICS now represents ~46% of world population and ~36% of global GDP; challenges G7-dominated global order

Topic/Sector: US–China Tech War — Chip Export Controls
Entity/Subject: US expands sweeping chip export controls targeting China's AI and military semiconductor access; allies pressured to follow
Key Player/Organization: Biden Administration, ASML, Nvidia, China's MIIT
Expected Impact/Value: Nvidia loses $40bn+ in Chinese market; ASML restricted from China; China accelerates domestic chip R&D; global supply chain fragmentation

Entity/Subject: Erdogan wins presidential runoff despite post-earthquake criticism; Turkey's 'pivotal' foreign policy continues between NATO and Russia
Key Player/Organization: Recep Tayyip Erdogan, Kemal Kılıçdaroğlu, NATO, Russia
Expected Impact/Value: Erdogan's 3rd term; Turkey maintains grain deal role; F-16 deal negotiated with US; Sweden's NATO bid delayed further

Entity/Subject: Pakistan reaches $3bn IMF bailout deal to avert default; army political tensions continue; Imran Khan arrested
Key Player/Organization: IMF, Shehbaz Sharif, Imran Khan, Pakistan Army
Expected Impact/Value: Inflation hits 38%; currency devalued 25%; political instability risks nuclear-armed state's economic collapse

Entity/Subject: 2023 confirmed warmest year ever recorded; devastating wildfires in Canada, Greece, Hawaii; extreme floods in Libya, India
Key Player/Organization: WMO, Copernicus Climate Service, IPCC
Expected Impact/Value: Global avg temperature 1.48°C above pre-industrial levels; Canada fires burn 15m hectares; Libya floods kill 11,000

Entity/Subject: Azerbaijan launches 24-hour military offensive; Nagorno-Karabakh capitulates; 100,000 ethnic Armenians flee to Armenia
Key Player/Organization: Aliyev, Pashinyan, Russia (CSTO), EU
Expected Impact/Value: End of 30-year conflict; entire Armenian population of Karabakh displaced; Russia's credibility as security guarantor shattered

Topic/Sector: Red Sea Houthi Attacks on Shipping
Entity/Subject: Houthi militants launch drone and missile attacks on commercial vessels in Red Sea in solidarity with Gaza; global shipping disrupted
Key Player/Organization: Houthis (Ansar Allah), US Navy, Maersk, BP, US-led Operation Prosperity Guardian
Expected Impact/Value: 30% of global container shipping rerouted around Africa; insurance costs spike; supply chain delays and inflation concerns

Entity/Subject: International Criminal Court issues arrest warrant for Putin over unlawful deportation of Ukrainian children
Key Player/Organization: ICC, Vladimir Putin, Karim Khan (ICC Prosecutor)
Expected Impact/Value: Putin cannot travel to ICC member states without arrest; South Africa faces dilemma over BRICS summit invitation

Entity/Subject: Storm Daniel triggers catastrophic flooding in Derna; thousands killed as dams collapse; governance failure exposed
Key Player/Organization: Libyan rival governments, UN OCHA, WHO
Expected Impact/Value: 11,000+ killed; 40,000+ displaced; dams failed due to decades of neglect; Libya's split government unable to coordinate response

Entity/Subject: India becomes 4th country to land on Moon; first to land near lunar south pole; soft power boost for Modi government
Key Player/Organization: ISRO, Narendra Modi, Russia (failed Luna-25)
Expected Impact/Value: India joins US, USSR, China as lunar landing nations; demonstrates scientific capacity; $75m mission vs. $1bn+ Western equivalents

Entity/Subject: Russia withdraws from Black Sea Grain Initiative; Ukraine grain exports collapse; food prices spike in Global South
Key Player/Organization: Russia, Ukraine, WFP, FAO, Turkey
Expected Impact/Value: Grain prices up 15%; 700m at risk of hunger globally; Sub-Saharan Africa and Middle East most impacted; WFP funding shortfalls

Entity/Subject: Finland officially joins NATO in April 2023; Sweden approved after Turkey drops objections in 2024. NATO's biggest expansion in decades
Key Player/Organization: NATO, Finland (Niinistö), Sweden (Kristersson), Erdogan
Expected Impact/Value: NATO gains 1,340km border with Russia; Baltic Sea becomes NATO lake; Russia's strategic depth sharply reduced

Topic/Sector: US–China Relations: Balloon Incident & Diplomatic Freeze
Entity/Subject: US shoots down Chinese surveillance balloon; diplomatic relations freeze; Blinken postpones Beijing visit
Key Player/Organization: Biden, Xi Jinping, Blinken, PLA Strategic Support Force
Expected Impact/Value: Lowest US-China relations in decades; military communications cut off; partial recovery by Bali and San Francisco summits

Entity/Subject: Sri Lanka finalizes $2.9bn IMF bailout and begins debt restructuring after 2022 economic collapse
Key Player/Organization: IMF, President Wickremesinghe, China, India (creditors)
Expected Impact/Value: Inflation falls from 70% to below 10%; foreign reserves rebuild; signals debt restructuring model for other distressed economies
